column4: How do I install a floppy drive in ubuntu brezzy badger after the os has been installed?   We don't have an fd0 entry in /dev.
If it's a USB floppy, just plug it in and it'll appear as /dev/sda (or whichever SCSI device is free next)
Did you enable the floppy in the BIOS?
Hm. Try a 'modprobe floppy'. Does /dev/fd0 appear after that?
